author: Melissa Quinn
title: Gottlieb says coronavirus must be stopped before rebooting economy
description: The former commissioner of the FDA said "there's not such thing as a function economy and society" if the virus isn't stopped.
content: Washington — As President Trump signals his desire to restart the U.S. economy, Dr. Scott Gottlieb, his first commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration, is warning that society cannot return to normalcy as long as the coronavirus continues to spread in… [+3054 chars]
